column51: comment:"The overall build of the product is cheap. It can clearly be seen that quality has been compromised to save some bucks and to stay competitive in the market. The push button is hard to press and gives a bad rattling sound while opening/closing. The unit which was delivered to me also had door imbalance issue and it couldn't close properly. Outer plastic frame is cheap which emits microwaves light out. A part of the outside metallic body also gets hot. If we see the the overall brand good will
